Articles.Content:
Well, I was mucking around with my primary trainer plane and I managed to make it land on the roof of the spaceplane hangar.

Attached is pictures of it.

A word of warning, the collision box is far larger than the model structure which makes it a challenge.

Good Luck!!!!!

Old picture of a SPH landing.

The VAB roof would make for a better landing challenge target since it\'s smaller and has a less nonsensical collider.
Aim for a mun-arch. It\'s further away and a smaller area...
I did have a rocket landed on the water tower at the launch assembly, but just as I got to get images to prove it, I find that my persistence file has been reset somehow :\'(

Nice, I have now landed a plane on the VAB and am aiming for the launch tower.

On a similar note, has anyone tried rocket bowling? (FLy a plane into a roket ready to launch)
